Accordingly, it is decided that the Unilever Sri Lanka Limited, the Appellant
Company is the manufacturer in respect of both products, namely, vim dish
wash bars and Signal toothbrushes, for the purpose of the Value Added Tax
Act, No. 14 of 2002.
The contention of the Appellant is that the value of the supplies made by the
Appellant Company is not liable for VAT, in terms of section 3 of the VAT Act,
since,  the  aforementioned  first  condition  is  not  fulfilled  in  the  present  case.
